translation.en: Oh, well, I'll just have to eat all those pancakes myself then.
translation.es: Bueno, tendré que comerme todas esas tortitas yo sola.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Here, put that on.
Yeah, I miss him too, Bunny.
translation.es: Sí, yo también lo echo de menos.

translation.en: And the blue one I like the most,
translation.es: Y el azul me gusta más

translation.en: 'cause he can camouflage in the water, and he has a beanbag to himself.
translation.es: porque puede camuflarse en el agua y tiene un puf para él solo.

translation.en: And has only a cushion and a beanbag.
translation.es: Y solo tiene un cojín y un puf.

translation.en: Okay, I'm just gonna place the probe.
translation.es: Vale, voy a introducir el transductor.

translation.en: That, Jordie, is a little heartbeat.
No. You better not be doing what I think you're doing.
translation.es: Será mejor que no estés haciendo lo que creo.

translation.en: To my party, is Joan coming?
translation.es: A mi fiesta. ¿Va a venir Joan?

translation.en: Uh, what makes you think that Joan might be there?
translation.es: ¿Qué te hace pensar que Joan podría asistir?

translation.en: Isn't it a bit hard to miss somebody if you've never met them?
translation.es: ¿No es difícil echar de menos a alguien que no conoces?

translation.en: I miss people I've never met all the time.
translation.es: Me pasa todo el rato con gente que no conozco.

translation.en: You're so cute. I love you.
Uh, it's probably just escaped from someone's backyard.
translation.es: Seguramente se ha escapado de su casa.

translation.en: But she was sitting here, waiting for me.
- Ah, it's pouring a gale out there. - Come in, come in.
- Does he need something? - Oh, he's fine.
translation.es: ¿Necesita algo? Está bien. Vengo de casa de su padre. No quería irse.

translation.en: I just picked him up from his dad's. He didn't want to leave.
translation.es: Está bien. Vengo de casa de su padre. No quería irse.

translation.en: Um, she's coming straight from work. She'll be here soon.
translation.es: Viene desde el trabajo. Llegará pronto.

translation.en: I'm gonna have to put posters up.
translation.es: Voy a tener que poner carteles.

translation.en: Or you could let her keep it.
translation.es: O deja que se lo quede.

translation.en: Well, I saw all the boxes.
- When I went to check on the kids. - Hmm.
translation.es: Al ir a ver a los niños.

translation.en: I hope you'll tell me if you're ever… not good.
translation.es: Espero que me avises si en algún momento… no estás bien.

translation.en: Maybe we should just cut the cake.
I'm so sorry. She's-- She's two minutes away. I'm so sorry. I'm really, really sorry about this.
translation.es: Lo siento. Está a dos minutos. Lo siento mucho.

translation.en: How are you guys? How's Denise?
We… are trying for a baby.
I thought Mia was gonna be an only child,
translation.es: Pensaba que Mia sería hija única.

translation.en: Well, apart from dinner, nothing. Just--
translation.es: Bueno, aparte de la cena, nada. Solo…

translation.en: - Hey. - Pete was just telling me the good news.
translation.es: - Hola. - Me ha dado la noticia.

translation.en: It'll be more work, but the pay is fantastic.
translation.es: Será más trabajo, pero el sueldo es fantástico.

translation.en: - And, frankly, I was done-- - Oh, no, no. That--
That you guys are trying for a baby.
Mia? It's okay. I'm coming, honey.
translation.es: ¿Mia? No pasa nada, ya voy, cariño.

translation.en: Sweetheart, let's see. Here, let me see.
He's only three, Mia. He doesn't understand.
translation.es: Tiene tres años. No lo entiende.

translation.en: Is that a birthday cake I saw in the kitchen?
translation.es: ¿Lo de la cocina es una tarta de cumpleaños?

translation.en: Why don't we go and have some cake?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no vamos a comer un poco?
Sí, venga, vete a la mierda.

translation.en: Mia, you have fur all over you.
- Can you take this off, please? - Don't!
This is Sandy McLennan from Warrendi Nursing Home.
translation.es: Soy Sandy McLennan, de la residencia Warrendi.

translation.en: Dr. Gregory, we'd like to meet with you to discuss your mother Joan's condition.
translation.es: Dra. Gregory, nos gustaría hablar con usted del estado de su madre, Joan.

translation.en: Can you please get in touch to arrange a time? Thank you.
translation.es: ¿Puede llamarnos para concertar una cita? Gracias.

translation.en: - Sorry. - Uh, you're welcome to call ahead.
translation.es: - Lo siento. - Puede avisar por teléfono.

translation.en: - Um, what-- Uh, where is she? - She went out to play. She's with Nowa.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde está? - Salió a jugar. Está con Nowa.

translation.en: - Hey, Tubby, have you seen Mia? - No.
You know, you can always tell me if there's someone bullying you, Mia.
translation.es: Siempre puedes decirme si alguien te molesta, Mia.

translation.en: Why won't you tell me why you were so upset today, Bunny?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dices por qué estás tan enfadada?

translation.en: Mia. I'm your mummy. You know that.
translation.es: Mia. Tu madre soy yo. Lo sabes.

translation.en: All right, Mia. Hop out. Gotta get ready for bed.
translation.es: Está bien. Sal. Prepárate para irte a dormir.

translation.en: Um, can you take that off, please?
So we have to put the trunk in the family tree about here.
translation.es: Tenemos que poner el tronco en el árbol genealógico.

translation.en: And all the people are the leaves.
translation.es: Y luego las personas son las hojas.

translation.en: And we went to the funeral.
Uh, she lives very far away.
We need to stick photos in too. How far away?
translation.es: Tenemos que poner fotos también. ¿A qué distancia?

translation.en: - Yes. - Can't we just draw the pictures?
Well, I'm gonna need them back.
- I don't have any photos of her. - Why not?
translation.es: - No tengo fotos de ella. - ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: I haven't seen her in a long time.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no la veo.

translation.en: I don't stay in touch with her.
translation.es: No estoy en contacto con ella.

translation.en: Well, that's just the way it is, Bunny.
But I need a photo of Joan.
translation.es: Pero necesito una foto de Joan.

translation.en: Maybe Grandpa had some in his boxes.
translation.es: Quizá el abuelo tuviera alguna en sus cajas.

translation.en: - What are you doing out of bed? - It's mine. I've been looking for it.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces levantada? - Es mía. La estaba buscando.

translation.en: No, it's not. Go back to sleep.
- It was dark and I couldn't wake up. - I know, Bunny.
translation.es: - Estaba oscuro y no podía despertarme. - Lo sé.

translation.en: It was just a bad dream.
Did you take this to bed with you?
translation.es: ¿Te has traído esto a la cama?

translation.en: Uh, I don't want you taking things that aren't yours.
translation.es: No cojas cosas que no son tuyas.

translation.en: But it is mine. It's me.
How do you know it's not me?
Because it was taken before you were born.
translation.es: Porque es de antes de que nacieras.

translation.en: All right. All right, good night--
Sweetheart, you-- Did you hurt yourself?
Did someone at school do this to you?
Is-- Mia, is someone hurting you?
Well, maybe if she sees me, she'll feel better.
translation.es: Quizá si me viera, se sentiría mejor.

translation.en: - No, I don't think so, Bunny. - I want to see Joan.
translation.es: - No, creo que no, conejita. - Quiero ver a Joan.

translation.en: I want to see Joan! I want to see Joan!

translation.es: ¿Por qué no puedo ver a Joan?

translation.en: I want to see Joan! I want to see Joan!
Shit. Shit. Oh, my God. Shit.
I didn't see you hit anything.
translation.es: No te he visto darle a nada.

translation.en: - Why do you need to look for it? - Because it might be injured.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué lo buscas? - Porque podría estar herido.

translation.en: Uh, you sure you didn't see anything?
Jesus, what? How'd that happen? Here.
I appreciate you coming here. Your mother talks about you.
translation.es: Gracias por venir. Su madre habla de usted.

translation.en: You said we needed to discuss her condition.
translation.es: Dijo que teníamos que hablar de su estado.

translation.en: Now, Sarah, I understand that your father hoped temporary care here
translation.es: Sarah, entiendo que su padre esperaba que el cuidado temporal
le diera un respiro a Joan.

translation.en: What Dad did for Joan was his business.
translation.es: Lo que hizo por Joan era asunto suyo.

translation.en: Oh, I understand that, and I'm sorry for your loss.
translation.es: Sí, lo entiendo. Y lamento mucho su pérdida.

translation.en: Your dad was a kind man.
I'm afraid it's my responsibility to tell you
translation.es: Me temo que es mi responsabilidad decirle

translation.en: that Joan will require ongoing care.
Uh, I'm sorry. Is this about increased fees?
translation.es: Perdón. ¿Se trata de un aumento de precio?

translation.en: Uh, there are additional costs but--
Uh, you… You have my email.
I didn't need to come in for this. Sorry.
translation.es: No era necesario venir. Lo siento.

translation.en: I know that you may have phoned Dad all the time,
translation.es: Sé que quizá llamaban a mi padre todo el tiempo,

translation.en: but I've been explicit about limiting necessary contact.
translation.es: pero fui explícita sobre limitar el contacto.

translation.en: I didn't even know he'd put her here until he was dying.
translation.es: Ignoraba todo esto hasta que él se moría.

translation.en: But, Sarah, this is not simply a matter of administration.
translation.es: Pero, Sarah, esto no es solo una cuestión administrativa.

translation.en: Your mother has been diagnosed with dementia.
She's been forgetting to wash herself.
She keeps asking for you in moments of lucidity.
translation.es: Pregunta por usted en momentos de lucidez.

translation.en: - You excited to meet your grandma? - Yeah.
She's had a bit of a rough morning.
Joan, this is Mia, Sarah's daughter.
translation.es: Joan, esta es Mia, la hija de Sarah.

translation.en: I'm here now. Don't be sad.
translation.es: Ya estoy aquí. No estés triste.

translation.en: Oh, I've missed you so much. So much.
translation.es: Te he echado mucho de menos.

translation.en: Where have you been? Where have you been?
- You belong to me. - Joan, calm down. Please, Joan.
translation.es: - Eres mía. - Joan, cálmate, por favor.

translation.en: - Okay, that's enough. - Joan, let go.
- Joan, come on. - Joan's had enough.
- Let's leave. - No, I don't want to!
- Don't leave me! - I don't want to go!
- Stop, Mia. We're going. - I don't want to go!
- I want to play with Joan. - Let go, please.
- Alice! - I don't want to go!
No! I don't want to go!
- No! I don't want to. - Mia.
- Stop! Stop! - Mia, just let me put your seatbelt on.
translation.es: - ¡Para! - Mia, deja que te ponga el cinturón.

translation.en: - Mia, put your legs inside. - I want to stay with Joan! - Put your legs in-- - I want to stay with Joan!
translation.es: - Mia, mete las piernas dentro. - ¡Quiero quedarme con Joan!

translation.en: - Stop kicking me. - No! I want to stay with--
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Please, baby. Bunny, let me see. I'm so sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry, sweetheart.
translation.es: Por favor, cariño. Conejita, déjame ver. Lo siento mucho. Perdona.

translation.en: I know that you might not understand why Mummy is…
translation.es: Sé que quizá no entiendas por qué mamá es…

translation.en: Wait. I wanna have a conv--
I said it looks like you've both been in the wars.
translation.es: He dicho que parece que ambas venís de la guerra.

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, you know, hard,
given the circumstances, but we're doing okay.
translation.es: dadas las circunstancias, pero va bien.

translation.en: And do you think Mia's coping with the loss of her grandfather?
translation.es: ¿Y crees que Mia está asumiendo la pérdida de su abuelo?

translation.en: Um, what do you mean, coping?
Sarah, the school is here to support.
translation.es: La escuela está aquí para apoyar.

translation.en: It's clear there's something troubling Mia. That's all.
translation.es: Claramente, Mia está inquieta por algo. Eso es todo.

translation.en: Right, well, I--  Yes, I did wonder whether she's being bullied.
translation.es: Sí, bueno… Sí, me pregunto si la están molestando.

translation.en: I think it's something quite different than that.
translation.es: Creo que es algo muy distinto.

translation.en: I've been finding these on the back of her homework.
translation.es: He ido encontrando esto por detrás de sus deberes.

translation.en: Sarah, I think that Mia is struggling to control her anxiety.
translation.es: Sarah, creo que a Mia le cuesta controlar su ansiedad.

translation.en: Most kids experience anxiety at some time or another.
translation.es: La mayoría de los niños sufren ansiedad en algún momento.

translation.en: You know, things change. The loss of a loved one is difficult.
translation.es: Las cosas cambian. La pérdida de un ser querido es difícil.

translation.en: But I think that Mia may need some extra help.
translation.es: Pero creo que Mia necesitará ayuda extra.

translation.en: Do you have a good family GP?
Oh, do you mean… professional help?
Sweetheart, do you wanna-- Do you wanna talk about what's been happening lately?
translation.es: Cariño, ¿quieres hablar de lo que ha pasado últimamente?

translation.en: I don't think I am myself.
translation.es: Creo que no soy yo misma.

translation.en: What does-- What does that mean, Mia?
I want you to call me Alice.
- Hmm, that's a pretty clever dog. - Look.
translation.es: - Es un perro muy listo. - Mira.

translation.en: - Bunny, you can't draw in library books. - I didn't.
translation.es: - No pintes en libros de la biblioteca. - No fui yo.

translation.en: Mia, you're not gonna get in trouble if you just tell the truth.
translation.es: No te meterás en problemas si dices la verdad.

translation.en: Well, you are, because you've drawn in a library book.
translation.es: Sí. Has pintado en un libro de la biblioteca.

translation.en: I don't understand what's going on with you lately, Mia.
translation.es: No entiendo qué te pasa últimamente, Mia.

translation.en: Why do you need to see Joan?
You never even met her till yesterday.
She says she loves me and I belong to her.
translation.es: Dice que me quiere y que soy suya.

translation.en: You don't belong to her. You…  You don't even know her.
translation.es: No eres suya. Ni siquiera la conoces.

translation.en: She's sick, Bunny. She doesn't know who you are.
translation.es: Está enferma, conejita. No sabe quién eres.

translation.en: She doesn't know who I am. She doesn't know who anyone is.
translation.es: No sabe quién soy. No reconoce a nadie.

translation.en: She does know who I am.
- I'm going to see her. - No, you're not.
translation.es: - Voy a verla. - De eso nada.

translation.en: Bunny, you are going to sleep.
Uh, no. Uh, no, he's not.
Okay, um, could you just let him know that I called?
Just need to run a few things past him.
translation.es: Solo tengo que consultarle unas cosas.

translation.en: I mean, I'm… I'm always here, if you need to talk.
translation.es: Bueno, siempre estoy aquí si necesitas hablar.

translation.en: Hey, I'm sorry about what happened with Toby.
translation.es: Oye, siento lo que pasó con Toby.

translation.en: I-- I completely understand why you lost your temper.
translation.es: Entiendo por qué perdiste los estribos.

translation.en: It's been really hard for you with your father's passing and…
translation.es: Lo has estado pasando mal con el fallecimiento de tu padre y…

translation.en: Pete mentioned it might have brought up all that stuff from before
translation.es: Pete dijo que quizá eso hiciera resurgir las cosas del pasado

translation.en: I can't imagine what it must have been like.
translation.es: No puedo ni imaginar lo que habrá sido.

translation.en: You're a good… You're a good girl.
- Sarah. - What the fuck did you tell her?
Denise. All that stuff from before.
translation.es: A Denise. Las cosas del pasado.

translation.en: I thought it was important that she know.
She understands, you know, trauma, family stuff.
translation.es: Entiende los traumas, los problemas familiares.

translation.en: She understands nothing. She doesn't need to understand anything.
translation.es: No entiende nada. No necesita entender nada.

translation.en: - It has nothing to do with her. - Okay. Okay.
Because the school called me, and they said they've spoken to you too.
translation.es: Porque me han llamado del cole y dicen que han hablado contigo.

translation.en: She--  She wanted-- She wanted to see Joan again.
translation.es: Quería volver a ver a Joan.

translation.en: - No. Pete, it's-- - Sarah, it'll be all right.
translation.es: - No. Pete, es… - Sarah, no pasará nada.

translation.en: Take Mia, show her the house, clear it out, and pack it up.
translation.es: Llévate a Mia, enséñale la casa, límpiala y recoge las cosas.

translation.en: - Put a fucking lid on it. - No, Pete--
translation.es: Pasa página de una vez. No, Pete…

translation.en: Sarah, let Mia have a relationship with her grandma.
translation.es: Sarah, deja que Mia tenga relación con su abuela.

translation.en: - Come back from where? - From where they go when they die.
translation.es: - ¿De dónde? - De dónde van cuando mueren.

translation.en: Grandpa said he would come back as a pelican.
translation.es: El abuelo dijo que volvería como un pelícano.

translation.en: It was our little secret. He said he wanted to keep an eye on you.
translation.es: Era nuestro pequeño secreto. Dijo que quería vigilarte.

translation.en: No, this is where I lived when I was little.
translation.es: No, aquí vivía yo cuando era pequeña.

translation.en: Hey, I'm gonna sleep in here.
translation.es: Eh, yo voy a dormir aquí.

translation.en: No, it's not. Come on, I don't wanna be in here.
translation.es: No eres tú. Venga, no quiero estar aquí.

translation.en: Uh-- Because I don't! Come on.
But I like it in here.
Come on, out. Get out. I don't want to--
- No. - I don't want to be in here. Get out.
translation.es: - No. - No quiero estar aquí. Sal.

translation.en: Can you draw me one after?
Before Grandpa and I moved to the city.
translation.es: Antes de mudarnos el abuelo y yo.

translation.en: I don't like to talk about it.
translation.es: No me gusta hablar de eso.

translation.en: I said I don't want to talk about it, Mia.
translation.es: He dicho que no quiero hablar de eso.

translation.en: Mia, I need you to tell me if someone has said something to you.
translation.es: Mia, necesito que me digas si alguien te ha contado algo.

translation.en: Denise… maybe? Or-- or your dad?
If someone has said something to you about Alice.
translation.es: Si alguien te ha dicho algo sobre Alice.

translation.en: Please.  Mia, this isn't a game.
translation.es: Por favor. Mia, esto no es un juego.

translation.en: Tell me if someone has said something to you that they shouldn't have.
translation.es: Dime si alguien te ha dicho algo que no debería.

translation.en: - It is not fun-- - I'm Alice! I'm Alice! I'm Alice!
Mia, look, I know you don't understand, but it really hurts Mummy…
translation.es: Mia, mira, sé que no lo entiendes, pero a mamá le hace daño…

translation.en: Looking forward to seeing your grandma?
- Yes. - Excellent. Up here, your first right.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres ver a tu abuela? - Sí. Excelente. Aquí delante, la primera a la derecha.

translation.en: - Mia. Mia. - I'll be here if you need me.
translation.es: - Mia… - Si me necesita, aquí estoy.

translation.en: Oh, we were here before, and you didn't recognize me.
translation.es: Estuvimos hace poco y no me reconociste.

translation.en: I've been wanting to meet you for such a very, very long time.
Albert told me all about you, little Mia.
translation.es: Albert me lo contó todo sobre ti, pequeña Mia.

translation.en: - Uh, Mia. - You called me Alice.
- Mia, stop it. - I don't understand.
- My name is Alice. You said-- - We're gonna go. Come on.
translation.es: - Me llamo Alice. Dijiste… - Nos vamos. Venga.

translation.en: - Why don't you remember me? - Mia, come on.
Can you tell me about her?
She had, uh… dark hair and freckles.
translation.es: Tenía el pelo castaño y pecas.

translation.en: She'd, um… She'd find animals and bring them home and look after them.
translation.es: Encontraba animales, los traía a casa y los cuidaba.

translation.en: No. Dogs. And… found a bird once.
translation.es: No. Perros. Y… una vez, se encontró un pájaro.

translation.en: My dad used to catch wild rabbits.
translation.es: Mi padre solía cazar conejos silvestres.

translation.en: I used to help him check the traps, but she didn't like that.
translation.es: Yo lo ayudaba, pero a ella no le gustaba.

translation.en: I don't like hide- and- seek. You don't look for me.
translation.es: No me gusta el escondite. No me buscas.

translation.en: You make me hide and hide and hide.
- Mia. - You make me hide all day.
translation.es: - Mia. - Me haces esconderme todo el día.

translation.en: You don't want to find me. You lock me in.
You've called Pete. I can't take your call at the moment. So leave a message.
translation.es: Hola, soy Pete. No puedo atenderte, así que deja un mensaje.

translation.en: I don't know if you or Denise had said something to Mia,
translation.es: No sé si tú o Denise le habéis dicho algo a Mia,

translation.en: And for whatever fucking reason, she's pretending to be her.
translation.es: Y por algún puto motivo, se hace pasar por ella.

translation.en: So if you could call me back, um…
I don't… I don't feel good, Pete.
I want to sell the house.
I'll pay for this place, this facility. You can stay here.
translation.es: Pagaré este sitio, la residencia. Puedes quedarte aquí.

translation.en: - I don't need-- - Dad asked me to before he died.
translation.es: - No necesito… - Papá me lo pidió antes de morir.

translation.en: you still spoke, but I didn't know-- I didn't know all this.
translation.es: seguíais hablando, pero yo no sabía todo esto.

translation.en: Oh.  You don't need to sell the house.
translation.es: No hace falta que vendas la casa.

translation.en: I'm gonna go back there when I leave here.
translation.es: Volveré cuando me vaya de aquí.

translation.en: It's what your father and I agreed.
translation.es: Es lo que acordamos tu padre y yo.

translation.en: What do you think's gonna happen? She'll stroll through the door one day?
translation.es: ¿Qué crees que va a pasar? ¿Que algún día entrará por la puerta?

translation.en: You've wasted your life waiting for her.
I don't want to look at you. I can't stand the sight of you.
translation.es: No quiero mirarte. No soporto verte.

translation.en: I should never have left her with you. - She's not safe with you. - Ow!
translation.es: Nunca debí dejarla contigo. No está a salvo contigo.

translation.en: You never, ever do that again.
translation.es: No vuelvas a hacer eso nunca.

translation.en: - Do you hear me? - I woke up and you weren't there.
translation.es: - ¿Me oyes? - Me desperté y no estabas.

translation.en: I don't care. What if something had happened to you?
translation.es: No me importa. ¿Y si te hubiera pasado algo?

translation.en: And did you-- Did you put the pictures back up?
- Did you go into the shed? - I didn't do anything.
translation.es: - ¿Has ido al cobertizo? - No he hecho nada.

translation.en: Joan is not gonna come back here.
translation.es: Joan no va a volver aquí.

translation.en: - So we need to pack everything up. - No!
You need to pack your things. I am taking you home tomorrow.
translation.es: Debes recoger tus cosas. Mañana te llevo a casa.

translation.en: I'm gonna have a shower. Just stay inside.
translation.es: Voy a darme una ducha. Quédate dentro.

translation.en: Mia, what's happening? Mia, it's okay. It's okay, sweetheart.
Stop, stop, stop, stop. You're having a nightmare.
- - It's okay. You're having a nightmare.
translation.es: Calma. Es una pesadilla. Es solo un sueño.

translation.en: Sweetheart, it's just a dream. It's okay. You're all right.
translation.es: Calma. Es una pesadilla. Es solo un sueño. No pasa nada. Estás bien.

translation.en: What's this? What's this? No, no.
- What? - Let me see. Let me see.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - No, tienes una herida. Déjame ver.

translation.en: - What? - Just let me see. I just need to--
- Did you hurt yourself? - What? Stop it!
- Just hold still. I need to get in here. - Stop it.
translation.es: - No te muevas, tengo que verlo. - Para.

translation.en: - I need to see what you've done-- - Stop it!
- No. Mia, I need to-- - Stop. Please, Mummy.
translation.es: - No. Tengo que… - Para, por favor.

translation.en: - It hurts! Stop! - Mia, don't. I just--
Please, let me in, Alice! Please, let me in, Alice!
Jesus, Sarah. Why haven't you been answering your phone?
translation.es: Por Dios. ¿Por qué no cogías el móvil?

translation.en: - Thank God! Baby. - Bunny. Bunny, you're…
Sorry, you're not allowed to be in here.
translation.es: Lo siento, no puede estar aquí.

translation.en: For the things I did to you.
translation.es: Siento las cosas que te hice.

translation.en: I told Mum you ran away.
translation.es: Le dije a mamá que te habías ido.

translation.en: Because I didn't wanna tell her the truth.
translation.es: Porque no quería decirle la verdad.
